title: Storage SaaS Platform
description: Built a Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) platform leveraging AI to provide automated business solutions with Next.js 14, Tailwind CSS, and Prisma.

title: Quantum Cloud Integration
description: Developed a hybrid cloud-quantum system integrating cloud computing with quantum processing for enhanced computational efficiency using AWS and IBM Quantum.

title: SkyVault
description: Built a personal cloud storage system using Docker containers, providing secure file uploading, listing, and downloading functionalities with interactive UI.

title: Ecobizz E-commerce App
description: Cross-platform mobile application built with Flutter SDK for sustainable products marketplace, running on both iOS and Android devices.
